full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU'I ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL @015A *, ,PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA BZHIR BYAS STE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR ICG ,
